wikipedia_page.main: Kevin David McGrath  (born March 1963) is a British businessman and philanthropist.

response: In March 2009, 100% ownership of the magazine passed to Kevin McGrath through a new company, Tribune Publications 2009 Limited, with the intention of keeping Tribune a left-of-centre publication, though broadening the readership.
* Kevin McGrath DL OBE (b.1963) High Sheriff of Greater London 2014/15
